Robert, in order for me to address you'll have to give me some clue as to how it happened. Can you provide me with steps that can be used to reproduce the problem?
I've encountered a similar exception using the following steps, both in Eclipse and in my RCP app:

1) Close all views but one (it helps if the remaining one is the error log).
2) Double-click on the remaining view's title tab to maximise it.
3) Detach the view.
4) Reattach it.  The view fails to reattach and this exception occurs:

If more than one view is open in the same area, the exception doesn't happen.

Aha, thanks. I've been able to repro this now. It's likely due to a failure to 'unmaximize' the view -before- the detach...

Committed in >20071207. I've changed the code to 'unzoom' before processing a 'detachPart'.

Note that this solves the use-case presented in Comment #2, but perhaps not the original defect. I'm going to mark this as FIXED. Robert, please feel free to re-open if you can provide info on reproducing your scenario...


Verified in I20071211-0010.
